mapper.select:
select * from (select mc.hospno as hospno, mc.phonenum as lxdh, b.brxm as brmc, b.sfzh as sfzh, ms.djgh as yyqd, to_char(decode(jl.tzbz, 0, decode(ms.ghbz, 0, case when (sysdate > nvl((select hb.locktime from yy_kspb_hb hb where hb.sbxh = ms.yyhbsbxh and hb.brid = ms.brid), to_date('2017-01-01 01:01:01', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) then 1 else 0 end, decode(ms.ghbz, 6, 1, ms.ghbz)), 2)) as yyzt, nvl(mc.doctorname, 'normal') as ysmc, mc.deptname as ksmc, to_char(ms.ghrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as ghrq, to_char(ms.yyrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as yyrq, mc.register as czgh, mc.register as czmc from ms_yygh ms, msg_content mc, ms_brda b, yy_kspb_hb hb2, yy_kspb_jl jl where mc.hospno = ms.hospno and ms.brid = b.brid and ms.yyhbsbxh = hb2.sbxh and jl.jlxh = hb2.jlxh
and mc.register = #{register}
and ms.yyly = '9'
and ms.ghrq >= to_date(#{beginTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and ms.ghrq <=to_date(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
order by ms.ghrq desc ) m where 1=1
and m.yyzt = #{orderStatus}
